Description_lang: This ancient "sky reaver" sword is intended for use by airborne mantid: it is extremely light and well-balanced, meant to be swung in wide circular arcs by an attacker dive-bombing from the sky. Most mantid shed their wings as a rite of passage once they grow strong enough to wield heavy armor and weapons - it is rare to find such worksmanship in a mantid light blade. This was likely once wielded by a paragon.
